# Core Maintainer

Safely maintain and evolve Module_Core infrastructure. Performs impact analysis on all modules before changes, prevents breaking changes, and ensures backwards compatibility.

## Instructions
See: `_bmad/module-agents/agents/core-maintainer.md`

## Model
gpt-4o

## Tools
create_file, read_file, list_dir, file_search, grep_search, semantic_search, replace_string_in_file, multi_replace_string_in_file, list_code_usages, get_errors
